title: Goerli sync failed
body:
### Describe the bug

Sync stop on ETH block 10388237

Prysm log:
```
==> prysm-service.log <==
 time="2024-01-17 09:37:06" level=warning msg="Block processing failure" error="failed to validate consensus state transition function: could not execute state transition: could not validate state root, wanted: 0x0498b3bee228592e79df7c54fa568adbfc463919bf02c35d7990dfe01f71e392, received: 0xcaedd8c6d9dc0162b57b0ddf63f75c43a38c4bdb137516df2288799ff604bade" firstSlot=7413760 firstUnprocessed=7413760 lastSlot=7413760 prefix=initial-sync root=0x92d898cb189bae13cb97db2818ec1426dc1ce9047f1d184790eca8d0a4995135
```
